definition: stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1
Li3 si1 te4 shi4 gan3 jun1
rou4 du2 gan3 jun1 du2 su4
rou4 du2 suo1 zhuang4 ya2 bao1 gan3 jun1

sentences.english: Bacterial leaching of copper-bearing pyrite is studied by use of thiobacillus ferrooxidans.
sentences.chinese: 采用氧化亚铁硫杆菌对含铜硫铁矿进行生物氧化研究。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of acid-fast stain test of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解结核分枝杆菌抗酸染色对肺结核的诊断价值。

sentences.english: This is the brief summary about the recent study progress on the secretion proteins of Mycobacteria .
sentences.chinese: 对近年来分支杆菌分泌蛋白研究进展进行了简要综述。

sentences.english: The types that cause disease are rare, Sadowski says.
sentences.chinese: 萨道斯基说，大肠杆菌会致病的种类很少。

sentences.english: Several species of Lactobacilli contain multiple S-layer protein genes.
sentences.chinese: 一些乳酸杆菌具有多个表层蛋白基因。

sentences.english: Lactobacillus acidophilus, or acidophilus for short, is one of the most useful organisms in your body.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酸乳杆菌，嗜酸或短，是最有益的生物在你的身体。

sentences.english: It showed that extracts from animal gastric mucosa have bifidus factor which promote the growth and propagation of bifidobacteria.
sentences.chinese: 证明胃粘膜提取物中含有促进双歧杆菌生长因子。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖对大肠杆菌的抑菌作用与其氨基的质子化有关。

sentences.english: But I wouldn't be the first to use Botox medicinally.
sentences.chinese: 但我不会是使用肉毒杆菌素做医疗用途的第一人。

sentences.english: The method of reverse phase hemagglutination test for serum Helicobacter pylori antigen(HP-RPHA)was founded.
sentences.chinese: 建立反相间接血凝法检测幽门螺杆菌抗原的方法。

sentences.english: How about reports of the dangers of Botox?
sentences.chinese: 对肉毒杆菌素的研究报告怎么样？

sentences.english: But the Pseudomonas aeruginosa has not formed antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 但对绿脓杆菌未形成抑菌环。
弯曲杆菌病是一种普遍的感染。

sentences.english: We are still learning a lot about the connection between H. pylori infection and gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我们还在继续研究幽门螺杆菌感染与胃癌之间的关系。

sentences.english: The development of the downstream treatment processes of Bacillus thuringiensis fermentation liquor were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了苏云金芽孢杆菌发酵液后处理工艺研究进展。

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽门螺杆菌根除治疗消化性溃疡是否能预防胃癌？

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
